long_description: When the warm days give way to cool weather, this is the pull-over you'll reach for. The Icebreaker Vista hoodie is soft and lightweight, and it keeps you warm in cool weather with merino wool. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool with a touch of elastane for easy stretch, this hoodie wicks moisture, dries quickly and resists odors-naturally. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Machine wash; lay flat to dry. Icebreaker Vista hoodie features a well-fitted hood and a comfortable, relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: When the warm days give way to cool weather, this is the pull-over you'll reach for. The Icebreaker Vista hoodie is soft and lightweight, and it keeps you warm in cool weather with merino wool.
